title: LIGHT IN THE DARK
description: LIGHT IN THE DARK In a world where darkness reigns, the last light dwells in the spirit of the forest. In this adventure Qualfy tries to free the spirit of light imprisoned by the sorcerer Notruw through traps and enemies to bring light back to his world. Game developed by: Nau.Games
instructions: Face enemies and traps to free the forest spirit.

title: Deep Space Horror: Outpost
description: You are out of energy for your space cruiser. Lucky for you, there is an Deep Space Outpost. You need to collect 8 Energy Cells so you can go on with your journey. But, this isn't easy as is sounds. Station is abandoned, by humans. Only think remain on that station, is not human, and its bloodthirsty! Good luck!
instructions: W A S D to walk around Mouse to Look around Left Mouse Button to Fire Right Mouse Button to Aim Mouse Wheel To Change Weapons G for Grenades R to Reload F to Pickup Items Left Shift to Run Left CTRL to Crouch X to Prone V to Melee Space to Jump

title: Arcalona
description: Arcalona is a huge RPG where you get to build your own base and upgrade your buildings while lvling up your heroes! Arcalona features a spell tree, attributes system, weapon equipping system and over 36 different enemies to fight your way through!
instructions: Mouse/Touchscreen

title: Straw Hat Samurai 2
description: The Straw Hat Samurai is back with new moves, air-combos, new enemies, new bosses… and more slashing and blood! Tips: 1) Headshots are instant kills. 2) Your line needs to start below the enemy if you want to launch him for air-combos. 3) In level 2, you need to draw a line from one platform to the next in order to jump from one platform to another. Your jump begins ONLY at the start of the line and ends at the endpoint of the line so start your line at the current position of the Samurai for best results. 4) Activate shunpo mode when enemies are vulnerable to perform more damage. Especially for bosses. 5) It is inefficient to attack armoured enemies by spamming slashes. Look out for their openings/weaknesses and use the special moves. 6) Projectiles can be deflected by slashing them. 7) When you are launched, activate shunpo mode to give yourself time to counter.
instructions: Use mouse to slash. (Best played with a mouse or stylus) Press SPACE to activate shunpo mode Press P to pause. Mute button is below the score.

title: Pirate Jack
description: cute pirate jack's ship is invaded by pirates and all he wants is to reach his precious chest! Pirate Jack will do his best to reach his chest. watch out you have to survive on this ship full of deadly guns and angry pirates.
instructions: *Move to WASD & Mobile Touch Control *Double Jump Available

title: Feudalism 3
description: Five factions at the continent are fighting each other in a bloody war. Each one have its strenghts and weaknesses, but who will win this battle? Who will you join to capture the whole world?
instructions: Mouse – move and attack; 1-9 – skill hotkeys; Space – pause;

title: Reach the Core
description: Two robots travel through the space. Suddenly they run out of energy. There is a planet with required plasma nearby. But to get it they need to reach the core!
instructions: PC: Arrows or WSAD Mobile: Built-in Joystick

title: My Little Army
description: Three (or more?) heroes are fighting to conquer all Myth Balls. Who’ll win? You’ll decide! Play the adventures of three curious heroes and the Little Army! Mix and match ’em with 8 unique classes, 48 characters, and 96 weapons to beat dozen of missions in each scenario, and other rewarding quests!
instructions: - arrow keys to move the camera - 1-7 Spell hotkeys - q,w,e,r Unit hotkeys - A to swap spell/unit ta…

title: Into Space 2
description: You have reached Space! But new goal awaits – Mars!. Upgrade your rocket, complete missions and achievements to unlock new equipment and reach new heights! Some advices: - Turn off the engine for maneuvers - Speed affects damage, so if you see that you can’t avoid the obstacle, try to slow down at least. More advices: – Fins greatly improve steering and also reduce the air resistance don’t forget to buy them. – If you can’t or don’t want to complete a mission, you can allways pay to skip it ( $ button in the mission description window). It will be counted as completed, new items will be unlocked, though you will not recieve the mission bonus. But you can complete it later and recieve the bonus. – Speed gates give you two stackable speed buffs. One for several seconds and strong, other will last much longer, but it is weaker.
instructions: A or Left – turn left D or Right – turn right S or Down – turn off engine W or Up – use boosters

title: Super Brothers
description: The little brothers are trapped in a fantasy world and they need your help to escape. Super Brothers is a 2D puzzle-platform game that follows the adventures of two brothers trapped inside a fantasy world fully of many dangerous things. Collect keys, unlock doors, and help the couple make their way out. Use different characters to cross water types, spikes and other things to complete each level and return home.
instructions: Instructions: WASD to move and spacebar to change characters. Touch buttons on screen on mobile devices.

title: Summon the Hero
description: Fantasy tower defense with unique system of battle! Summon the Hero is a tower defense strategy game that takes place in a medieval kingdom threatened by all sorts of fantasy monsters. Hire upgradeable units, complete tasks that revolve around defending the kingdom, and see if you can survive through all 18 battles.
instructions: mouse/touchscreen

title: Mini Golf Funny
description: Are you ready for mini golf excitement? besides, it's funny. In mini golf funny, you will never lose the fun and your connection to the game, take care of your ball. Drag and drop the ball towards the hole where it should be.
instructions: Drag and Drop & Mouse Left Click Pause "P" Restart "R"

title: The Pyramid Adventure
description: The Pyramid Adventure game is an adventure that you play in collaboration with 2 Player. Collect diamonds and solve puzzles in historical pyramids. Complete the sculptures in the pyramid and open the locked doors! Use your weapons for the monsters and traps you encounter. To get out of the pyramid, you have to pass a total of 20 levels. Let the adventure begin!
instructions: Move: "W,A,S,D" Shot: "F" Jump: "W" Switch weapon: "Q" PLAYER 2 Move: "ARROW KEYS" Grenade "L" Jump: "UP ARROW KEY" Pick Up Box: "K"

title: Diggy
description: Dig your way to the center of the earth in search for great treasures. Upgrade your equipment to help you along the way! Help Diggy dig to the center of the earth and find the wandering truffle.
instructions: Use your mouse to aim Diggy's drill, and click to drill in that direction. Press E to activate Diggy's radar and locate hidden objects, then drill to them and pick them up.

description: Are you ready for the second adventure of the cute pirate? Help Jack the pirate, in a cute and cute blue and white striped t-shirt, survive his adventure full of green whales. be careful whales can kill you jump on them to kill whales! kill the whales, collect the bombs and reach the door. Remember, the water level is constantly rising, try not to drown in the rising water level.

Will you be able to deal with dangerous enemies and powerful bosses? Lead Ninja Rian with skills such as gliding, jumping, throwing darts, sword skills and more.

title: Stick War: New Age
description: A new one has been added to stickman games. This is Stick War: New Age. The stick fighting game opens to you the doors of an exciting adventure world. What are you waiting for to join? Click and join the world of stickman stick fighting. Take care of your Stickman character. Your opponents are waiting for you for the Stick fight. With the Armed Stickman, you can also destroy your opponents and some of the obstacles that come across you. Are you ready to become a stick fighter? Many obstacles are waiting for you in the game. Swinging barbed balls, wheels with rotating blades, moving rocks. In each chapter you will encounter obstacles that are more difficult than others.You have to master them all and finish all 40 episodes successfully. Proceed step by step to victory. Enjoy the most exciting stickman stick fighting game of adventure games. You can play the game anywhere you want. You can play Stick fight the game with your friends at school or at home. Hours of fun and excitement are waiting for you. Hihoy Games wishes you a pleasant time!

title: Hero Telekinesis

Huge bosses wear armor, enemies with shields can deflect your attacks, and arrows are constantly firing at you. Destroy them all with telekinesis!

title: Hero 3 Flying Robot

instructions: Mouse - Look around WASD - Movement Space / Ctrl - Move up / down Shift - Accelerated flight Left Mouse Button - Shoot with your left hand Right Mouse Button - Activate Beam F - Activate firing missiles

title: Rafting Adventure
description: Grab your pontoon and row down the super fast current of a mighty river. Look out for sharp rocks, logs and bears, as hitting such obstacles would end your rafting right away. There are yellow ducks floating here and there - collect them for points!
instructions: Tap left or right to steer your pontoon.

title: Tomb of the Mask Neon
description: Tomb Of The Mask neon is a arcade game, where the player has to go through a different maze levels, evade generated obstacles, and laberinths full of mortal traps and enemies. To control our little tomb, you need to slide the finger across the screen in the desired way until it collides with an obstacle. Thanks to the masks that open as you progress through the missions, you receive different super powers. Evade spikes, traps, and neon enemies in your way to reach the secret Tomb Mask

title: Survive The Glass Bridge
description: Your goal in Survive The Glass Bridge game developed by meyagames.com team is to reach across by choosing the right glasses. Since one of the two glasses on the platform is produced using thin glass, it cannot bear the weight. This is why you will fall. You have to look carefully to find the difference between the 2 glasses. If you want, you can change your ability to understand the difference between the two glasses by selecting the difficulty level from the main menu. In addition, if you do not reach the other side within the specified time, the game is over. For more games, please visit meyagames.com.
instructions: Character movement: W,A,S,D or Arrow keys, Jump : Space, Move the mouse to see the surroundings.

There are a total of 10 hidden signs in each level, there are a total of 8 levels.
